name: Escabeche Salad
description: The “escabeche” here refers to the acidic vinaigrette for this very easy, refreshing salad. This meal is built to take care of leftover meat and vegetables. Simply toss everything together and dress it. It will keep for a few days.
recipeIngredient: 6 tablespoons good vinegar, or to taste
1/4 cup minced onion, shallot or scallion
2 cups leftover chicken, beef, fish or the like (even tofu)
2 cups cooked vegetables, rinsed with boiling water if necessary to remove any sauce
6 cups salad greens, washed, dried and packed in a container

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk or blend olive oil, vinegar, salt, pepper, Dijon, onion and garlic; adjust seasoning as necessary.
Pour the sauce over the protein and vegetables and refrigerate overnight and for up to several days. When you’re ready to serve, put a portion of the escabeche over greens.
